title: Assoc. Director Genomics Data Science/Discovery
notes: From the drylab-side, I lead LifeEdit's supervised learning strategy for protein optimization.
I develop genomics workflows to process NGS data in support laboratory scientists.
I visualize and statistically model experimental output.
I am leading the development of LifeEdit's massive protein catalog for protein discovery.

title: Data Scientist and Data Science Group Leader
notes: Designed and led the development of AgBiome's AWS Genomics Data Platform
Developed cloud-based infrastructure and data scientist developer tooling to write and deploy data-driven monitoring and real-time analytics dashboards
Wrote (first author) AgBiome's first peer-reviewed scientific publication, awarded with the 'Editor's Pick' distinction by The Phytobiomes Journal

title: Adjunct Faculty Instructor

notes: I Teach Data Science Basics course (BIOS-512) in the Gillings School of Global Public Health.

title: Postdoctoral Researcher and Research Associate
notes: Designed and applied a microbiome analysis pipeline for DNA-SIP-based microbial ecology studies of agricultural soils and biological soil crusts
Published several manuscripts as first author in refereed journals and contributed as a co-author to many additional scientific publications

title: Teaching Fellow Microbial Diversity Course, Four Summers
notes: Taught data analysis best practices in microbiome science focusing on the QIIME and Mothur toolkits and molecular biology laboratory techniques

title: SULI Undergraduate Researcher, Two Summers
notes: Two summers studying thermophilic microoragnisms at INL
